title: Sales_Accelerator v2: Boost Issue_Tracker issue priority using deal-risk context

sections.text: Add prioritization logic that consumes the normalized Sales_Accelerator deal-risk fields (risk score, deal stage, ARR, impacted deal count) persisted on the issue context record and applies a deterministic priority boost to the issue. Include clear weighting/thresholds and caps so boosts are explainable and don’t override critical manual priority settings. Emit an audit trail on the issue (e.g., “priority boosted due to deal risk”) and add metrics/logging for boosts applied vs. skipped (missing/invalid context).
